column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////i love this place it reminds me of ippudo in NYC. the chicken ramen was so good. The broth and the egg were so good. Will be back here again!! yummy!!! ovii...its better than carton ramen. I love the thick noodles. this place is so hip and my friend parked in the garage with free parking. wait was not that long a summer weekday night
